CONVERSATION GROUP: Why yes, some of the workers from the docks came by to tell me about it.  It sounded far too dangerous to keep in the store.  If you want to ask about it, I'd try the warehouse out by the docks.
So what are you going to do now, MONGREL!? I take it you're not going to continue where Yssaria left off... if he ever did leave anything helpful behind, the fool.
"Day 34 - It feels like years since I received the shipment that at first seemed all things usual....but there was an extra package I didn't order...
"Day 13 - Joslin is becoming more violent. He doesn't like these lessons anymore, so while he was passed out I had to tie him up...it's not only for my own safety, but his as well.
I do not pity him. Joslin knew what he was signing up for. The shipment we received last tenday explained this to us quite clearly. I'll revisit his vitals soon.
"....Inside it was someone whom I now consider to be a great friend! Nay, a teacher! A model of knowledge that I must follow!
"Day 18 - Teacher wants some unusual things to conduct these lessons. I've had to clear out our usual inventory...starting to sell it all.
"This will all be worth it soon. The streets of Luskan will know of the name, Yssaria!! Nay, I can think even wider than that....
